Key Match Events: Anrich Nortje took 4 wickets for 7 runs.
South Africa won by 6 wickets with 22 balls remaining.
Wanindu Hasaranga took 2 wickets for 22 runs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Nassau County International Cricket Stadium, New York.
Sri Lanka elected to bat first after winning the toss.
Anrich Nortje was named Player of the Match.
